goal:
Tuotos represents the interests of film and audiovisual producers, particularly in the field of copyright and related rights. We negotiate, collect and distribute royalties on retransmission, on private copying and on educational or scientific uses etc. Tuotos is a Extended Collective Licensing Organisation (certain fields). We are actively monitoring the digital distribution and services and licencing them (new forms of use) by mandate of our clients, the audivisual producers.

Tuotos is highly motivated to get the digital market working well for all the involved stakeholders. Tuotos is committed in providing the pratical licencing solutions for all mass uses.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Education, Enterprise, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
